alternativeNames: Nyárády, Erasmus Julius; Nyárády, Erasmus Gyula
examples: Cirsium × moldavicum Dobrescu & Nyár. in Fl. Republ. Socialist. Romania, 9: 731, 971 (1964)
source: Additional alternative name from Viktor Virók. Obit. in Contr. Bot. Univ. "Babes-Bolyai" Cluj-Napoca, 1966(2): 1 (1966), incl. portr. & l.c. 46:127-130 (2011)
